nodes.label: 露比·萝丝
nodes.info: The title character of the show is a 15-year-old girl who typically dresses in a black dress and a red cloak. She wields Crescent Rose, a scythe that can transform into a high caliber sniper rifle. Her Semblance is called "Speed", enabling her to run faster than the human eye can catch, and change directions in mid-air.

nodes.label: 怀丝·雪倪
nodes.info: 角色原型是白雪公主，名字取自「白雪」的德語。代表色是白色。慣用手是左手(平時戰鬥時或寫字時都是使用左手)

nodes.label: 阳小龙
nodes.info: Yang, the fourth member of Team RWBY, is a yellow-haired girl and, at 17 years of age, Ruby's older half-sister. She wields twin shotgun gauntlets called Ember Celica. Her Semblance works on a "recoil-based system": whenever Yang takes a hit, her strength, toughness and striking power rise in proportion to her injuries. Her glowing hair and eye color change are caused by excess energy from the buildup, which also results in Yang often acting very "hotheaded" in battle.

nodes.label: 亚当·托鲁斯
nodes.info: 登场：RWBY预告片之Black，暂未在正片中出现。身为弗纳人，特征为头上的角，“白牙”成员，使用居合流刀术。与Blake一起劫持雪倪尘晶公司的运货火车，但在是否放炸弹（将会误伤火车上的其他无辜群众）之事与Blake意见相左，最后Blake砍断了火车的连结栓来宣告脱离“白牙”组织并与Adam分离。官方确认Adam与Blake的关系近似学徒和师傅的关系，也表现得相当关心Blake。
